ReviewList.Text: Concepts, examples are easy to understand or in other words, with great clarity. However, exercises are rather a little easy for those of you who is going to pursuit an in-depth study in the science majors.

Prior to taking the physics class with this textbook I had no knowledge of physics.  This book was written very clearly and was exceptionally easy to understand.  Another person who was taking physics at the same time using the "College Physics" book often borrowed my text to understand the ideas and formulas better.  I really appreciated the tables of coversion formulas in the back cover, it was nice not having to Google or flip through the book all the time!
I chose a five-star rating for this book because the information in this book was explained in simple language, therefore, it is easy to understand the information in this book.
I gave it five stars because it was exactly what they said it would be, and that is all I ask of a reputable website.
This book came in as I had expected it too be as well as on time! Very happy with this purchase!!

Arrived fast and as described in the ad. I am using it for a class and needed it promptly which was more important to me than good condition. It was in good condition for a used book too. I recommend this seller !
It would've been nice to know beforehand that I was going to receive a book with missing pages, because then I would've never even thought about buying it!!!
Shipping was very fast and book was in an ok condition as stated. The book is very helpful for learning medical terminology.
I ordered my text book through amazon to save money and it came in better condition than the same text my friend rented from the university.

I don't know what you want me to reviewing because I already gave my report the book was fasted sent before the day. I really appreciated and the only problem, it did had a lot of writer in that I did not liker, because was in Chinese or Japanese, any way I can't read any of those language that was okay! i did not mind have somebody well language did not hurt. I like it is very good book.
Textbook was in fair condition.  A bit of wear and tear.  Cheaper than the book store but the books were in better condition.

The seller said the book was in "very good" condition and it is not.  I would say it is in "poor" condition.  It is very beaten up and old looking, like it has been banging around someone's trunk for 5 years.  It is certainly not worth the money I paid since I could have gotten a "like new" one at my bookstore here for about $10 more and not had to wait for it.  Boo!  This item was definitely misrepresented.  Normally I sell my textbooks back on here when the semester's over and don't lose too much money, but this one will be a bigger loss for me.
